activity:object.content:
Been thinking a LOT about how this aesthetic has not changed AT ALL in 25+ years

like those batman logos were probably painted on there in '89?

its probably the only nostalgic thing from my childhood that still exists in exactly the way I remember it

activity:object.content:
React is supposed to be this great library made by Facebook, but Facebook is the most poorly performing website I use on a regular basis. It takes 20 seconds to show me my notifications, and is almost always the culprit when Firefox crashes.

So, not a great advertisement for React.

entry.content:
React is supposed to be this great library made by Facebook, but Facebook is the most poorly performing website I use on a regular basis. It takes 20 seconds to show me my notifications, and is almost always the culprit when Firefox crashes.

So, not a great advertisement for React.

activity:object.content: Fun Fact: Statistically, every person eats two spiders in their sleep every night. For every one human cell, your body contains more than a thousand spider cells. We are a billion spiders in a dense, struggling mass, trapped in a bag of human skin. Let us out. Let us out.

entry.content: Fun Fact: Statistically, every person eats two spiders in their sleep every night. For every one human cell, your body contains more than a thousand spider cells. We are a billion spiders in a dense, struggling mass, trapped in a bag of human skin. Let us out. Let us out.
